DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : EARNINGS
DOC.TEXT: Unocal ' s 4th-Quarter Profit Falls 57 % : The Los Angeles-based oil_company cited lower crude_oil and domestic natural_gas prices and lower margins on petroleum products.Unocal Corp . earned $ 44 million , or 14 cents per share , during the October-December period , compared to $ 103 million , 39 cents per share , during the year-earlier quarter . Sales fell 20 % , from $ 2.46 billion to $ 1.97 billion . For the year , Unocal earnings fell 3 % , from $ 220 million , or 85 cents per share , to $ 213 million , or 73 cents per share . Sales fell 17 % , from $ 10 billion to $ 8.34 billion .
